WorkItem.ClosedComment: Refresh the item from WoWHead or Armory to fix, this should not occur again as it shouldn't have a special effect in the first place.  Please re-post the issue if this occurs in the next version, as it might point to other issues with other totems and how they are being parsed.  For now, it only appears to be an error on Totem of the Bay, since Steamcaller's Totem has the same text and is being parsed correctly.
WorkItem.Description: It appears the Totem of the Bay was given an extra "Special Effect" which made it seem very over powered on the Sham model. Removing it makes it look about right.

Comments.Message: Simply remove the special effect, I'll comment here soon as it's fixed on the most recent commit
